item.title: Accenture is DOGE's first corporate casualty as shares dive on warning that contracts will be cut
item.description: Shares of Accenture slid more than 7% on Thursday after the consulting firm said tighter federal spending efforts have begun to weigh on its revenues.

item.title: One of the wildest chip stocks reports earnings after the bell. What analysts are thinking
item.description: Analysts anticipate continued strength in the company's chips business as pricing and demand improve in the latter half of this year.

item.title: These income-generating stocks are currently beating the market and offer rich yields
item.description: Mortgage REITs are putting on a strong performance in what's been a rocky period for the overall market, but investors should proceed with caution.

item.title: The aging population is a $1 trillion opportunity. These stocks are the winners, says Mizuho
item.description: Spending by American consumers 75 years old and older will nearly double in the next five years, Mizuho says. Here are its top picks.
